autoReplies.response: Pause and Anderz live on opposite sides of the world, the high ping doesn't allow them to play together.
Please don't use emoji's in chat, (_PURGE_), as they don't appear correctly for everyone.
Pause is currently a Master Guardian II in CS:GO.
